Description: Diademed head of Ptolemy II, right. (obverse)
Eagle standing on thunderbolt with wings closed, left; between legs, I. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Kingdom of Egypt Ancient Greece and Rome: Kingdom of Egypt
Bibliographic references: Svoronos 1904 / Τα Νομισματα του Κρατους των Πτολεμαιων (The Coins of the Ptolemaic Kings) (574) (type)
SNG Copenhagen / Sylloge Nummorum Graecorum: The Royal Collection of coins and medals, Danish National Museum (43 vols) (110) (type)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Ptolemy II Philadelphos
